extDescription.message: This extension provides you the script file to collect images on the page you're just watching.

optCommandTemplateDescription.message: (You can embed the URL of each image by using the $url.)

optFilterExtsDescription.message: (Please specify the file extension of the image you want to target separated by a space.)

optFilterExceptsDescription.message: (Please specify the keywords separated by spaces in the URL you want to exclude.)

optFilterSizeDescription.message: (Please specify the minimum size of the image you want to target.)

optFilterPriorityLinkHref.message: If the img tag had been surrounded by a tag, the href attribute value of a tag is adopted.

optFilterPriorityLinkHrefDescription.message: (The thumbnai image can be excluded, if checked.)

popupCopied.message: The script was copied to the clipboard.
